Used to be a really enjoyable game, but the new matchmaking system completely ruined it for me. There's no reason why rank 20s should be playing against rank 1s. The hit validation is also trash. You can be point blank hitting somebody as killer and they'[ll take no damage. You'll hear the sound and see the blood but no damage.
